title: MA61009: Computer Graphics - Quick Facts

Course name | Computer Graphics

Previous Year Grade Distribution

Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: void Graphics Systems, Input and output devices, Basic raster graphic algorithm, Mathematics for computer graphics, Object hierarchy, Three dimensional object representation, Geometric and solid modeling, Representation of curves and surfaces, Hidden line removal, Illumination and shading, Image manipulation, Animation, Dialogue design, User interface.
